pageProduct.name: Skin Doctors InGrow Go Solution 120ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Skin Doctors ingrow go™ removes ingrown hair caused by shaving, waxing or epilating in as little as 24 hours for smooth, bump free skin. 120ml.

Skin Doctors ingrow go™ is a ingrown hair treatment and prevention in one product. It helps to:Remove ingrown hairs caused by shaving, waxing or epilatingRemove razor bumpsCreate smooth, bump free skinRecommended for:All skin typesSuitable for sensitive skin areasSuitable for male & female sufferers

Size: 120mL

Ingredients

Key Ingredients:Isopropyl Alcohol - antibacterial agent to help clear out infected pores.Propylene Glycol - delivers moisture to the skin.Acetyl Salicylic Acid - anti-inflammatory to reduce the swelling associated with ingrown hairs.Glycolic Acid - a type of Alpha Hydroxy Acid known as â€œfruit acidsâ€ naturally occurring in sugar cane juice. It is most effective AHA due to its small molecular structure that allows it to penetrate the surface of the skin more readily. It acts as a mild exfoliant to remove dry skin cells and reduce redness.All Ingredients:Isopropyl Alcohol, Water (Aqua), Acetyl, Salicylic Acid, Glycerin, Glycolic Acid, Propylene Glycol, Triethanolamine.

Directions

SHAKE CAN WELL BEFORE USE. Hold can 15cm from underarm and spray. Do not apply to broken skin. Stop use if irritation develops. Do not spray near eyes or face. CAUTION Pressurised dispenser. Protect from sunlight and do not expose to temperatures exceeding 50?. Do not pierce or burn even after use. Intentional misuse by deliberately concentrating or inhaling contents may be harmful or fatal. WARNING DO NOT SPRAY NEAR A NAKED FLAME OR ANY HOT SURFACE. KEEP AWAY FROM SOURCES OF IGNITION - NO SMOKING. KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN. Extremely Flammable,
